10.<center>この世界で 平和に 暮らしていた|すべての 生きとし生ける者は|:
All the living beings who lived peacefully| in this world are in danger of| extinction. Now there are two suns|
| rising in the sky. The second sun has turned| this world into a hell since it appeared| and is now running through the sky|
| at will, scorching the earth, drying| up the sea, and sending people| into a burning despair. We have no way|
| of knowing why there were two suns. All we| know is that all living things| on this earth are about to be destroyed.

11.<center>『風の民 エルフ』|自然を愛し 森と共に生きる|背に小さな羽を持:
"Elves, People of Wind"| They are beautiful people with| wings on their back who love|
| nature and live with the forest.| They value tradition, studied the ways| of the world, and produced|
| many excellent spellcasters.

12.<center>『炎の民 オーガ』|厳しい荒野で チカラ強く生きる|大きな身体に:
"Ogres, People of Fire"| They live strong in the harsh lands,| with large bodies, horns and|
| tails. They are belligerent,| respect the strong and use their| superior strength and stamina to|
| risk their lives for the weak.

13.<center>『地の民 ドワーフ』|雄大な山々に恩恵を受け 大地と共に生きる|:
"Dwarves, People of Earth"| They live with the earth, blessed by| the majestic mountains, with small|
| bodies and big ears. With their high| technology and strong desires,| they built many advanced civilizations|
| with their pure dexterity and speed.

14.<center>『水の民 ウェディ』|海に浮かぶ美しい島々で 自由に生きる|青き:
"Weddie, People of Water"| They live freely on beautiful islands in| the sea and their bodies are blue like|
| water. They hate constraints and value| singing and love. They use their speed| and strength to fight only when they|
| have to protect those they love.

15.<center>『花の民 プクリポ』|絵本のような色彩の町で 楽しさを求めて生き:
"Pukulipo, People of Flowers"| In a town with colors like a picture| book, they have fluffy, adorable|
| little bodies living in search of fun.| Born with strong magical power and| dexterity, they are more|
| passionate about creating things| for fun than for fighting.

16.<center>『勇の民 人間』|どんな地でも 生きていける|大きくもなく 小さ:
"Humans, People of Courage"| They have bodies that are not too big or| too small to survive in any land. They|
| may not have any outstanding| qualities, but when faced with a| crisis, they have the courage to|
| stand up against it.

17.<center>『空の民 竜族』|はるか かなたより|世界を見守る 聖なる者たち:
"Dragons, People of the Sky"| The holy ones who watch over the world| from afar. Whenever there is a|
| conflict on earth, they fly over and| bring peace with their great powers.
